empty_state.title: Configure a New Key Set
empty_state.description: A Key Set object holds a collection of asymmetric key objects. This entity allows to logically group keys by their purpose.

search.placeholder: Filter by exact name or ID

delete.title: Delete a Key Set
delete.description: Deleting this key set will also delete keys associated. This action cannot be reversed so make sure to check the key set usage before deleting.

errors.general: Key sets could not be retrieved
errors.delete: The key set could not be deleted at this time.

general.title: General Information
general.description: General information will help identify and manage this key set.

name.label: Name
name.placeholder: Enter a unique name for this key set

tags.label: Tags
tags.placeholder: Enter a list of tags separated by comma
tags.tooltip: An optional set of strings for grouping and filtering, separated by commas.
